abstract: Google has placed views of earthquake and tsunami damage in its maps of Japan. You’ll see the idyllic countryside change dramatically, becoming cluttered with mountains of rubble and debris as you get closer to the ocean, says one of the Google executives managing the project.
snippet: Google has placed views of earthquake and tsunami damage in its maps of Japan. You’ll see the idyllic countryside change dramatically, becoming cluttered with mountains of rubble and debris as you get closer to the ocean, says one of the Google ex...
lead_paragraph: A toppled building; mangled cars and miles and miles of debris:Google has uploaded scenes from the Japanese tsunami’s aftermath to its Street View service, offering a unique if heart-wrenching virtual peek into the destruction along Japan’s Pacific coast.
